{"id":947101396,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"7Â months","timestamp":1683617230,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"40 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/947101396/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Zigzag Conversion","memory":"16.8 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    string convert(string s, int n) {\n        if(s.length()<n||n<2)\n        return(s);\n        vector<vector<char>> zigzagRows(n);\n        bool flag=true;\n        int row=-1;\n        string output=\"\";\n        for(char c:s){\n            row=flag?row+1:row-1;\n            zigzagRows[row].push_back(c);\n            if(row==0)\n            flag=true;\n            if(row==n-1)\n            flag=false;\n        }\n        for(vector<char> row:zigzagRows){\n            string rowSum=\"\";\n            for(char c:row)\n            rowSum+=c;\n            output+=rowSum;\n        }\n        return(output);\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"zigzag-conversion","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
